verses.verse: And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Balak <WH1111>, Build <WH1129> <WH8798> me here seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and prepare <WH3559> <WH8685> me here seven <WH7651> oxen <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams <WH352>.

And Balak <WH1111> did <WH6213> <WH8799> as Balaam <WH1109> had spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>; and Balak <WH1111> and Balaam <WH1109> offered <WH5927> <WH8686> on every altar <WH4196> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352>.

And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Balak <WH1111>, Stand <WH3320> <WH8690> by thy burnt offering <WH5930>, and I will go <WH3212> <WH8799>: peradventure the YY <WH3068> will come <WH7136> <WH8735> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> me: and whatsoever <WH1697> he sheweth <WH7200> <WH8686> me I will tell <WH5046> <WH8689> thee. And he went <WH3212> <WH8799> to an high place <WH8205>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> met <WH7136> <WH8735> Balaam <WH1109>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, I have prepared <WH6186> <WH8804> seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and I have offered <WH5927> <WH8686> upon every altar <WH4196> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352>.

And the YY <WH3068> put <WH7760> <WH8799> a word <WH1697> in Balaam's <WH1109> mouth <WH6310>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Return <WH7725> <WH8798> unto Balak <WH1111>, and thus thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762>.
And he returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto him, and, lo, he stood <WH5324> <WH8737> by his burnt sacrifice <WH5930>, he, and all the princes <WH8269> of Moab <WH4124>.

And he took up <WH5375> <WH8799> his parable <WH4912>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Balak <WH1111> the king <WH4428> of Moab <WH4124> hath brought <WH5148> <WH8686> me from Aram <WH758>, out of the mountains <WH2042> of the east <WH6924>, saying, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, curse <WH779> <WH8798> me Ya`akov <WH3290>, and come <WH3212> <WH8798>, defy <WH2194> <WH8798> Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
How <WH4100> shall I curse <WH5344> <WH8799>, whom 'Elohim <WH410> hath not cursed <WH6895> <WH8804>? or how shall I defy <WH2194> <WH8799>, whom the YY <WH3068> hath not defied <WH2194> <WH8804> ?

For from the top <WH7218> of the rocks <WH6697> I see <WH7200> <WH8799> him, and from the hills <WH1389> I behold <WH7789> <WH8799> him: lo, the people <WH5971> shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> alone <WH910>, and shall not be reckoned <WH2803> <WH8691> among the nations <WH1471>.

Who can count <WH4487> <WH8804> the dust <WH6083> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, and the number <WH4557> of the fourth <WH7255> part of Yisra'EL <WH3478>? Let me die <WH4191> <WH8799> <WH5315> the death <WH4194> of the righteous <WH3477>, and let my last <WH319> end be like his!

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Balaam <WH1109>, What hast thou done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto me? I took <WH3947> <WH8804> thee to curse <WH6895> <WH8800> mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, and, behold, thou hast blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> them altogether <WH1288> <WH8763>.

And he answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Must I not take heed <WH8104> <WH8799> to speak <WH1696> <WH8763> that which the YY <WH3068> hath put <WH7760> <WH8799> in my mouth <WH6310> ?

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, I pray thee, with me unto another <WH312> place <WH4725>, from whence thou mayest see <WH7200> <WH8799> them: thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH8799> but <WH657> the utmost <WH7097> part of them, and shalt not see <WH7200> <WH8799> them all: and curse <WH6895> <WH8798> me them from thence.

And he brought <WH3947> <WH8799> him into the field <WH7704> of Zophim <WH6839> <WH8677> <WH6822> <WH8802>, to the top <WH7218> of Pisgah <WH6449>, and built <WH1129> <WH8799> seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and offered <WH5927> <WH8686> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352> on every altar <WH4196>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Balak <WH1111>, Stand <WH3320> <WH8690> here <WH3541> by thy burnt offering <WH5930>, while I meet <WH7136> <WH8735> the YY yonder <WH3541>.

And the YY <WH3068> met <WH7136> <WH8735> Balaam <WH1109>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> a word <WH1697> in his mouth <WH6310>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Go again <WH7725> <WH8798> unto Balak <WH1111>, and say <WH1696> <WH8762> thus.

And when he came <WH935> <WH8799> to him, behold, he stood <WH5324> <WH8737> by his burnt offering <WH5930>, and the princes <WH8269> of Moab <WH4124> with him. And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, What hath the YY <WH3068> spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> ?

And he took up <WH5375> <WH8799> his parable <WH4912>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Rise up <WH6965> <WH8798>, Balak <WH1111>, and hear <WH8085> <WH8798>; hearken <WH238> <WH8685> unto me, thou son <WH1121> of Zippor <WH6834>:

'Elohim <WH410> is not a man <WH376>, that he should lie <WH3576> <WH8762>; neither the son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, that he should repent <WH5162> <WH8691>: hath he said <WH559> <WH8804>, and shall he not do <WH6213> <WH8799> it? or hath he spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>, and shall he not make it good <WH6965> <WH8686> ?
Behold, I have received <WH3947> <WH8804> Mitzvah to bless <WH1288> <WH8763>: and he hath blessed <WH1288> <WH8765>; and I cannot reverse <WH7725> <WH8686> it.

He hath not beheld <WH5027> <WH8689> iniquity <WH205> in Ya`akov <WH3290>, neither hath he seen <WH7200> <WH8804> perverseness <WH5999> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>: the YY <WH3068> his 'Elohim <WH430> is with him, and the shout <WH8643> of a king <WH4428> is among them.
'Elohim <WH410> brought them out <WH3318> <WH8688> of Egypt <WH4714>; he hath as it were the strength <WH8443> of an unicorn <WH7214>.

Surely there is no enchantment <WH5173> against Ya`akov <WH3290>, neither is there any divination <WH7081> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>: according to this time <WH6256> it shall be said <WH559> <WH8735> of Ya`akov <WH3290> and of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, What hath 'Elohim <WH410> wrought <WH6466> <WH8804> !

Behold, the people <WH5971> shall rise up <WH6965> <WH8799> as a great lion <WH3833>, and lift up <WH5375> <WH8691> himself as a young lion <WH738>: he shall not lie down <WH7901> <WH8799> until he eat <WH398> <WH8799> of the prey <WH2964>, and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> the blood <WH1818> of the slain <WH2491>.
And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Balaam <WH1109>, Neither curse <WH5344> <WH8799> them at all <WH6895> <WH8800>, nor bless <WH1288> <WH8762> them at all <WH1288> <WH8763>.

But Balaam <WH1109> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Balak <WH1111>, Told <WH1696> <WH8765> not I thee, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, All that the YY <WH3068> speaketh <WH1696> <WH8762>, that I must do <WH6213> <WH8799> ?

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Balaam <WH1109>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, I pray thee, I will bring <WH3947> <WH8799> thee unto another <WH312> place <WH4725>; peradventure it will please <WH3474> <WH8799> <WH5869> 'Elohim <WH430> that thou mayest curse <WH6895> <WH8804> me them from thence.
And Balak <WH1111> brought <WH3947> <WH8799> Balaam <WH1109> unto the top <WH7218> of Peor <WH6465>, that looketh <WH8259> <WH8737> toward <WH6440> Jeshimon <WH3452>.

And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Balak <WH1111>, Build <WH1129> <WH8798> me here seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and prepare <WH3559> <WH8685> me here seven <WH7651> bullocks <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams <WH352>.
And Balak <WH1111> did <WH6213> <WH8799> as Balaam <WH1109> had said <WH559> <WH8804>, and offered <WH5927> <WH8686> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352> on every altar <WH4196>.
